title: Ornn jungle: start hunters potion?

replies.body: Interesting idea. Although you miss out on the extra experience from killing the red buff, and you require a stronger leash from your teammates since you are lacking the extra monster killing potential you get from Hunter's Machete and or Hunter's Talisman.
While I do not see myself doing that personally, I do think it is an interesting idea.
no, you start jungle item then after your first gank or so you do back and finish hunters pots.
